data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pinto-Da-Rocha, Ricardo, Bonaldo, Alexandre B. (2011): Species relationships in the Neotropical genus Phareicranaus Roewer 1913 (Opiliones: Cranaidae): two new species and new data from Penial morphology. Zootaxa 3135: 1-34, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.207840
